Producer: Henry Winterstern, Kevin Turen, Steve Golin, Alix Madigan, Gregg Araki
Synopsis: Jane (Anna Faris), a struggling but perpetually stoned actress, has a busy day ahead. She has several important tasks on her list, including buying more marijuana. Even though she already has a good start on the day's planned drug use, she eats her roommate's pot-laced cupcakes and embarks on a series of misadventures all over Los Angeles.
Title: Smiley Face
